mention.text: Los Angeles County Sheriff Sherman Block
Sheriff Block , an outspoken opponent of semiautomatic assault weapons
Los Angeles County Sheriff Sherman Block
Los Angeles County Sheriff Sherman Block
the NRA against the police Lobbyist
the NRA , a veteran of previous unsuccessful attempts to outlaw military-type semiautomatics
Lobbyist David Marshall of the NRA

Gary Mullen , executive director of the California District Attorneys Assn. , of the campaign that will pit the NRA against the police Lobbyist David Marshall of the NRA , a veteran of previous unsuccessful attempts to outlaw military-type semiautomatics
